languages.text: "Как-то раз Леди Теодора отправила меня лично в Дворец Администратума за нужной ей справкой. Две недели моей жизни, которые никто не вернет назад".
"Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."
languages.original_text: "Как-то раз Леди Теодора отправила меня лично в Дворец Администратума за нужной ей справкой. Две недели моей жизни, которые никто не вернет назад".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."
"Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."
"Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."
"Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人有一次让我去内政部的宫殿，领取她需要的证书。于是，我就彻底失去了我生命中两周的时间。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人有一次让我去内政部的宫殿，领取她需要的证书。于是，我就彻底失去了我生命中两周的时间。”

languages.text: « Un jour, dame Théodora m'a envoyé au palais de l'Administratum chercher un certificat dont elle avait besoin. Deux semaines de ma vie envolées. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, dame Théodora m'a envoyé au palais de l'Administratum chercher un certificat dont elle avait besoin. Deux semaines de ma vie envolées. »

languages.text: «Lady Theodora me envió una vez al palacio del Administratum a por un certificado que necesitaba. Nunca recuperaré esas dos semanas de mi vida».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora me envió una vez al palacio del Administratum a por un certificado que necesitaba. Nunca recuperaré esas dos semanas de mi vida».

languages.text: 「かつてレディ・シオドーラに遣わされ、行政局宮殿へ彼女の求める証明書を取りに行ったことがありましたが…あれは取り戻すことの叶わぬ二週間です」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: 「かつてレディ・シオドーラに遣わされ、行政局宮殿へ彼女の求める証明書を取りに行ったことがありましたが…あれは取り戻すことの叶わぬ二週間です」

languages.text: "Lady Theodora hat mich einmal in den Palast des Administratums geschickt, um eine Beglaubigung zu beschaffen — diese zwei Wochen meines Lebens bekomme ich nie wieder zurück."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora hat mich einmal in den Palast des Administratums geschickt, um eine Beglaubigung zu beschaffen — diese zwei Wochen meines Lebens bekomme ich nie wieder zurück."

languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora bir keresinde tasdiknamesini almam için beni Administratum Sarayı'na göndermişti. Ömrümden iki hafta çalındı gitti."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora once sent me to the Administratum Palace to obtain a certificate she needed — that is two weeks of my life that I will never get back."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora bir keresinde sertifikasını almam için beni Administratum Sarayı'na göndermişti. Ömrümden iki hafta çalındı gitti."
